p: Forty-five compounds were characterized in the oils of needles and twigs of P. peuce, representing 98.6% and 97.3% of the total identified components, respectively. The major constituents identified on the needle and twig oils, respectively are: α-pinene (36.8% and 16%); β-phellandrene (6.1% and 35.8%); β-pinene (13% and 21.5%), germacrene D (10% and 4.7%); α-terpinol (9.3% and 2.4%); camphene (8% and 2%); bornyl acetate (4.2% and 3.3%).
